proposal1.heroHeadline: KBD is losing $10,000 a year on manual proposal writing. Here's where it leaks.
proposal1.heroSubheadline: Crafting each proposal manually wastes hours that could be spent on client engagement. Automate in 47 seconds.
proposal1.problemsIntro: These are the ongoing losses KBD faces with current proposal processes.

problems.title: Time Drain
problems.description: Each proposal takes 3 hours to prepare manually. That's 6 hours a week lost for a two-person team, equating to $5,000 annually in lost billable time.

problems.title: Missed Deals
problems.description: Delayed proposals result in missed opportunities. Every day a proposal is late, you risk losing $1,000 in potential contracts.

problems.title: Inconsistent Branding
problems.description: Manually crafted proposals lead to inconsistent branding. A single off-brand proposal can cost you a $500 client relationship.

problems.title: Human Error
problems.description: Errors in proposals lead to client distrust. Correcting these errors can cost $1,000 in lost productivity annually.

problems.title: Lack of Tracking
problems.description: Without proposal tracking, you miss insights on client engagement. This oversight can result in $2,000 of lost upsell opportunities each year.

problems.title: Client Dissatisfaction
problems.description: Slow turnaround times frustrate clients. Each dissatisfied client can lead to a loss of $1,500 from potential referrals.

proposal1.solutionIntro: Our AI system replaces all the inefficiencies described above.

solutions.title: Rapid Proposal Generation
solutions.description: Currently, proposals take hours to write. Our system generates them in under 60 seconds using AI.

solutions.title: Consistent Branding
solutions.description: Branding varies when done manually. Our AI ensures every proposal aligns perfectly with your brand.

solutions.title: Error-Free Proposals
solutions.description: Human error is inevitable. Our system minimizes mistakes with automated checks.

solutions.title: Integrated Tracking
solutions.description: Without tracking, client engagement is a mystery. Our system provides real-time insights on proposal interactions.

solutions.title: Enhanced Client Satisfaction
solutions.description: Clients wait for manually written proposals. With our system, prompt delivery keeps clients satisfied and engaged.

proposal1.whyUsIntro: Four reasons this works. Not marketing claims. Engineering facts.

whyUsCards.title: Speed
whyUsCards.description: Every hour your team spends writing proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. This system gives those hours back. Lead data in, live proposal out, 60 seconds.

whyUsCards.title: Personalization
whyUsCards.description: Generic proposals get ignored. Personalized proposals close. The system reads each prospect's website and reflects their services, tone, and positioning back to them. Written from scratch, not templated.

whyUsCards.title: Ownership
whyUsCards.description: No monthly subscription bleeding your budget. No vendor deciding to raise prices or shut down. You own the source code, the infrastructure, and the data. Permanently.

whyUsCards.title: Support
whyUsCards.description: Personal onboarding, a video walkthrough your team can reference anytime, and one week of post-delivery support. You are not left figuring this out alone.

fearCards.title: You are probably thinking: our stack is complicated.
fearCards.sub: CRM, email, Sheets, Slack. The system connects to whatever you already use. No migration.

fearCards.title: You might be wondering if this breaks your current workflow.
fearCards.sub: It runs alongside everything you have. Nothing changes except the time you spend on proposals.

fearCards.title: You are concerned the output will not match your standards.
fearCards.sub: Revisions are part of the build. We configure, test, and refine until the output matches your bar exactly.

proposal1.teamIntro: Your point of contact. No handoffs, no account managers, no layers.

team.name: Ayush Chauhan
team.bio: Full-stack engineer specializing in AI automation for agencies and service businesses. Every engagement personally handled from architecture through deployment. 15+ systems built. Zero failed deliveries. Works async, ships fast.

proposal1.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Kickoff (Async or Call)
process.description: We map your workflow, services, and current proposal process. Can be a 15-minute call or handled entirely over email. By the end, we have everything needed to configure the system.

process.title: System Configuration
process.description: The engine gets configured with your services, pricing structure, tone of voice, and brand standards. Every proposal it generates will sound like your best strategist wrote it.

process.title: Build and QA
process.description: Test proposals generated and reviewed against your quality bar. Refinements continue until the output is indistinguishable from what your team produces manually.

process.title: Deployment and Handoff
process.description: Deployed to production with full infrastructure. You receive a video walkthrough, documentation, and complete source code. From this point, the system runs without us.

proposal1.pricingIntro: Two options. Both are one-time builds. No subscriptions, no recurring fees. You own the source code and infrastructure permanently.

pricing.name: Proposal Engine
pricing.subtitle: // Core System
pricing.description: Custom proposal automation configured for KBD's services, voice, and pricing structure.

pricing.name: Engine + AI Chatbot
pricing.subtitle: // Recommended
pricing.description: Everything above, plus an AI sales assistant embedded in every proposal. Handles objections, answers questions, and books calls for KBD around the clock.
features: AI chatbot on every proposal page

proposal1.ctaHeadline: See this running on your actual proposals.
proposal1.ctaDescription: Reply here or email Ayush directly. He will send the onboarding form. Takes about 10 minutes and the build starts the same day. Custom-configured for KBD.

proposal2.heroHeadline: Elevate Acme Corp's Market Presence with KBD's Expertise.
proposal2.heroSubheadline: Transform Acme Corp's digital footprint with a targeted marketing strategy that drives measurable results.
proposal2.problemsIntro: Acme Corp is currently experiencing significant revenue losses due to missed opportunities.

problems.title: Low Conversion Rates
problems.description: Every visitor who leaves your site without converting is revenue walking out the door. This is costing you thousands monthly.

problems.title: Poor Brand Visibility
problems.description: Without a strong online presence, Acme Corp is losing potential customers to competitors. This results in declining market share.

problems.title: Ineffective Ad Spend
problems.description: Money spent on underperforming ads is directly impacting your bottom line with little to no return on investment.

problems.title: Weak Social Media Impact
problems.description: Low engagement on social platforms means missing out on connecting with your audience, leading to lost brand loyalty and sales.

problems.title: Outdated Website Design
problems.description: A dated and unresponsive website can deter potential clients, resulting in lost leads and decreased customer trust.

problems.title: Lack of Data Insights
problems.description: Without actionable insights from your data, strategic decisions are less effective, leading to missed growth opportunities.

proposal2.solutionIntro: To address these losses, KBD offers targeted solutions designed to enhance Acme Corp's market performance.

solutions.title: SEO Optimization
solutions.description: Enhance your search visibility to attract and convert more visitors. This improves your online presence and revenue potential.

solutions.title: Website Redesign
solutions.description: Revamp your site to be responsive and engaging, ensuring a higher conversion rate and improved customer experience.

solutions.title: Data Analytics
solutions.description: Utilize insights from your data to make informed decisions that drive growth and optimize marketing strategies.

solutions.title: Social Media Management
solutions.description: Boost your brand's presence on social platforms to increase engagement and foster brand loyalty.

proposal2.whyUsIntro: Here's why KBD is the right partner for Acme Corp's growth.

whyUsCards.title: Proven Expertise
whyUsCards.description: With years of experience, we deliver strategies that work, ensuring your brand's success.

whyUsCards.title: Data-Driven Decisions
whyUsCards.description: We use comprehensive analytics to guide our strategies and maximize your ROI.

whyUsCards.title: Client-Centric Approach
whyUsCards.description: Our team is dedicated to understanding and meeting your unique business needs.

whyUsCards.title: Innovative Solutions
whyUsCards.description: We stay ahead of industry trends to provide cutting-edge solutions that drive results.

proposal2.teamIntro: Meet the team dedicated to your success.

team.name: Kevin Brown
team.bio: Kevin leads strategy and client relationships, ensuring every campaign is aligned with business goals.

proposal2.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Discovery & Planning
process.description: We start by understanding your business and market.

process.title: Strategy Development
process.description: Crafting a tailored marketing strategy that aligns with your goals.

process.title: Execution
process.description: Implementing the strategy across chosen platforms.

process.title: Review & Optimize
process.description: Analyzing results and optimizing for continuous improvement.

pricing.description: Basic services to get you started on improving your online presence.

pricing.name: Growth Package
pricing.description: Comprehensive solutions designed to significantly boost your market impact.

pricing.name: Premium Package
pricing.description: All-inclusive services for maximum growth and brand expansion.

proposal2.ctaDescription: Let's discuss how we can help drive your business forward. No commitment, just a conversation.
